mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(oid, ozipcode, oaddress, oreceiver, ophone, otel, omemo, oemail, ousedmileage, obeforeprice, oafterprice, ostatus, mid, pmcode, odate) VALUES(#{oid}, #{ozipcode}, #{oaddress}, #{oreceiver}, #{ophone}, #{otel}, #{omemo}, #{oemail}, #{ousedmileage}, #{obeforeprice}, #{oafterprice}, #{ostatus}, #{mid}, #{pmcode}, #{odate})
INSERT INTO order_item(psid, oid, oicount, oitotalprice) VALUES(#{psid}, #{oid}, #{oicount}, #{oitotalprice})
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET ostatus=#{ostatus} WHERE oid=#{oid}
